clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Apatinib Reverses Chemotherapy-Resistance of Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial of Apatinib Reverses Chemotherapy-Resistance of Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: A single arm study: Apatinib plus paclitaxel as the reverses treatment in advanced gastric cancer which paclitaxel-resistant.

detailed_description.textblock: This trial investigated the efficacy and safety of apatinib plus paclitaxel, as a treatment option for patients with advanced gastric cancer which paclitaxel-resistant.

clinical_study.condition: Malignant Neoplasm of Stomach Stage II

arm_group.description: Apatinib Mesylate Tablets (850 mg qd p.o.) and Paclitaxel (80mg/m2 i.v. d1, d8, d15, q28d)

intervention.description: Apatinib (850 mg qd p.o.) plus paclitaxel (80mg/m2, i.v. d1,d8, d15, q28d)until disease progression or intolerable toxicity
